parameters.name: BizId
parameters.description:
Verification ID. A unique ID that identifies a verification task, not exceeding 64 characters. For a single verification task, the system supports unlimited submissions until the final verification is passed and the task is completed.

> Different BizIds are required for different verification tasks.

parameters.name: BizType
parameters.description: Identifier for the business scenario using the real person authentication service. Please refer to [Business Settings](~~127885~~) and complete the creation in the console first.

parameters.name: FaceRetainedImageUrl
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS link to the retained portrait photo.

parameters.name: IdCardBackImageUrl
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS link to the national emblem side of the ID card image.

parameters.name: IdCardFrontImageUrl
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS link to the portrait side of the ID card image.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: ID of the end user, such as the account ID of the end user.

parameters.name: UserRegistTime
parameters.description: User registration time. Expressed in timestamp format, unit: milliseconds.
